plugin.name: WebSphere
plugin.description: Supports management and monitoring of WebSphere Application Server

c:simple-property.name: host
c:simple-property.description: The host name of the application server or administrative agent to connect to.

c:simple-property.name: principal
c:simple-property.description: The name of the principal (i.e. user) to authenticate.

c:simple-property.name: credentials
c:simple-property.description: The credentials (i.e. password) that should be used to authenticate the principal.

c:simple-property.name: wasHomeDir
c:simple-property.description: The absolute path to the directory where WebSphere is installed (e.g. /opt/IBM/WebSphere/AppServer).
